info.author: Michael Kluge
info.description: combines expression of biological or technical replicates; all replicates are scaled to the same number of reads and averaged afterwards

param.name: bedgraphFiles
param.description: path to sorted BEDGRAPH files; at least two files must be given; all files must contain the same chromosomes in the same order

param.name: mergedIdxstatsFile
param.description: path to a tab-separated file that contains the output generated by samtools idxstats for all samples (columns 1-4) and in the 5th column the sample name; used columns: 1 -> chr name; 3 -> number of mapped reads; 5 -> name of the sample

param.name: notSkipHead
param.description: disables the skipping of the first line of the idxstats file (--mergedIdxstatsFile); default: first line is skipped

param.name: numberOfDigits
param.description: number of decimal places to round the calculated values

param.name: normByReadCount
param.description: number of reads to which each replicate is normed (based on the idxstats output) before values are averaged
